text: Mercedes Simone Mercedes Simone (April 21, 1904, Villa Elisa, Buenos Aires - October 2, 1990) was an Argentinian singer and actress, known as "La Dama del Tango" ("The Lady of Tango"). ==Filmography== * ¡Tango! (1933) * ' (1936) * La vuelta de Rocha (1937) * Ambición (1939) * La otra y yo (1949) Category:1904 births Category:1990 deaths Category:Argentine female singers Category:Argentine film actresses Category:People from Buenos Aires Province Category:20th-century Argentine actresses Category:20th-century Argentine singers Category:20th-century women singers
title: Mercedes Simone
